derivation: from G206 (ἀκροβυστία) and probably a modified form of (the penis or male sexual organ);
strongs_def: the prepuce; by implication, an uncircumcised (i.e. gentile, figuratively, unregenerate) state or person
outline:
1. having the foreskin, uncircumcised
  2. a Gentile
  3. a condition in which the corrupt desires rooted in the flesh were not yet extinct
